title: NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White
cat_seo_title: NZXT CPU Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy NZXT CPU Cooler at best price in BD. Keep your processor cool with Cooler Master CPU Cooler. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
full_description:
NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White

The NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White is a high-performance cooling solution designed to keep your CPU temperatures in check. With its sleek and stylish design, featuring an aluminum heat pipe cover, it not only performs well but also adds a touch of aesthetics to your PC build. The standout feature of the T120 is its discreet aluminum heat pipe cover, which elegantly conceals the copper piping. This design choice not only enhances the cooler's visual appeal but also ensures efficient heat transfer from the CPU to the cooler. The T120 boasts four conductive copper heat pipes that utilize Direct Contact technology, enabling maximum thermal transfer and effectively dissipating heat from the CPU. The cooler is equipped with a fan that provides high static pressure, allowing it to move a substantial amount of air through the radiator for excellent cooling performance. Additionally, the slim radiator footprint of the T120 ensures that it won't obstruct nearby RAM or GPU slots in most PC cases, offering flexibility in terms of component placement. Included with the T120 are retention brackets and mounting accessories for both Intel and AMD motherboards, making it compatible with a wide range of systems. This ensures easy installation and compatibility with your preferred CPU socket type. The T120 comes with 1 gram of NZXT High-Performance Thermal Paste, which aids in the efficient transfer of heat between the CPU and the cooler. This ensures optimal cooling performance right out of the box. The slim design of the cooler allows sufficient space for an additional fan, which can be installed to further enhance exhaust airflow out of the back of your PC. This extra fan can contribute to overall improved cooling efficiency, especially in systems with higher thermal loads. The NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler is a compact and stylish cooling solution that offers excellent thermal performance. Its aluminum heat pipe cover, copper heat pipes with Direct Contact technology, high static pressure fan, and compatibility with both Intel and AMD motherboards make it a versatile choice for PC enthusiasts seeking effective cooling without compromising on aesthetics or functionality.

Buy NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest NZXT CPU Cooler to purchase for your Desktop PC. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The NZXT T120 120mm Air CPU Cooler White comes with 2 years warranty.

title: NZXT T120 RGB 120mm Air CPU Cooler

full_description:
NZXT T120 RGB 120mm Air CPU Cooler

The NZXT T120 RGB 120mm Air CPU Cooler is a high-performance air cooler designed to provide excellent thermal performance while adding a stylish touch to your PC. Its sleek aluminum heat pipe cover not only enhances its aesthetics but also discreetly hides the four conductive copper heat pipes with Direct Contact technology. The Direct Contact technology ensures maximum thermal transfer from the CPU to the cooler, allowing for efficient heat dissipation. The cooler is equipped with high static pressure fans, which effectively move a significant amount of air through the radiator, resulting in excellent cooling performance. Additionally, the fans feature RGB lighting, adding a touch of flair to your PC setup. The NZXT T120 RGB CPU cooler comes with retention brackets and mounting accessories for both Intel and AMD motherboards, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of systems. Its slim radiator footprint allows enough space for an additional fan, enabling further acceleration of exhaust airflow out of the PC. With customizable RGB lighting, you can personalize the aesthetics of the cooler to match your preferences using the NZXT CAM software. Please note that the RGB & Fan Controller is not included and needs to be purchased separately. The package includes 1 gram of NZXT High-Performance Thermal Paste, ensuring optimal heat transfer between the CPU and the cooler. Additionally, the design of the cooler ensures that it won't block RAM or GPU slots in most cases, providing flexibility and compatibility with various PC configurations.

Buy NZXT T120 RGB 120mm Air CPU Cooler from Star Tech

full_description:
NZXT Kraken X63 280mm All-in-One Liquid CPU Cooler

The NZXT Kraken X63 280mm All-in-One Liquid CPU Cooler is a stunning must-have for any build with the addition of NZXT fans. With a re-designed cap and larger infinity mirror ring LED, the Kraken X63 delivers an amazing experience in luminous liquid cooling. It comes with an All-new 7th Gen Asetek pump providing better cooling and 800RPM whisper-quiet performance. It has 2 x Aer P 140 with a speed of 500 - 1,500 + 300 RPM, It includes an NZXT connector for compatibility with our Aer P fans or NZXT accessories. It has a 6-year warranty.

values.value: -Water Block Material: Block: copper; Housing: plastic
